notifications.email-ns: This browser doesn't support it yet.

hero.title: Frontend Developer, web enthusiast
hero.desc: I‚Äôm Patryk, a Frontend Developer based in Warsaw, Poland, specialising in creating PWA apps, client-side code optimisations, projects support & improvements, and so on. I enjoy creating things that help others to achieve their goals.
hero.subtitle: Follow me

dbbetb-e46b8r8b54e3f.title: IGPlus Browser Extension
dbbetb-e46b8r8b54e3f.desc: An Instagram extension that allows users to disable Reels, Stories, recommendations, vanity metrics, and customize themes, fonts, and more. Has ~1400 active users across all platforms.

db64-be4dbf8r8b54e3f.title: GPT 3.5 / 4 Automation CLI Tool
db64-be4dbf8r8b54e3f.desc: A CLI tool with multiple pipelines for automated posts generation using OpenAI GPT 3.5 / 4. It offers: combining post chunks, post validations, QuillBot Paraphraser for all / random str (to avoid plagiarism and AI detection), Unsplash API relative image search +multiaccount for API, and more.

db64-betnrwnrt45v4gn.title: Lichess Browser Extension
db64-betnrwnrt45v4gn.desc: Extension for Lichess. Adds new themes, pieces, boards, fonts, and features such as annoying popups disable, modern layout, coordinates on each square, and many more. Available for Google Chrome, Firefox, and MS Edge.

db64-be46bmyr8b54egf.title: ChessHelper for Chess.com
db64-be46bmyr8b54egf.desc: Contains almost the same features but for Chess.com. Has ~800 active users on all platforms. Most of the pieces and boards were created by myself, and some are from web with GNU / CC0 License.

db64-be46b8rht53f.title: Parallax Gallery
db64-be46b8rht53f.desc: Gallery project with a smooth parallax effect. Lightweight and efficient, comprising only ~100 lines of code.

db64-rt46b8r8b543f.title: SpoPlus Extension for Spotify
db64-rt46b8r8b543f.desc: Extension that enables customization and personalization of the web version of Spotify. Set up new themes, fonts, remove annoying notifications, popups, and more. ~800 active users on all platforms.

db64-betnrgn-ntrt44v4gn.title: Chess in Browser
db64-betnrgn-ntrt44v4gn.desc: Chess game in the browser. Developed using OOP, TypeScript, with mobile support. Currently implemented features include pieces capture, main pieces move rules, and en passant. In progress are short and long castle, checks, checkmate, kings' single square gap, and more.

db64-be46b8r8b54e3f.title: TrainingPeaks - Sport Monitoring
db64-be46b8r8b54e3f.desc: Monitoring for personal training with three main resources: plans, daily feelings, and workouts. Each section is customizable, allowing users to easily drag and drop training sessions from one day to another. Additionally, it provides weekly statistics.

dbf0-beqr56b8r8brbe5l.title: OnlineStats.info
dbf0-beqr56b8r8brbe5l.desc: Service for monitoring users publicly shared online status in Telegram Messenger. Utilizes JWT Auth, bizcharts charts, final-form for forms. Also it offers i18n locales and a dark theme.

dbf0-beqr0b890eq9r8b98.title: Music App
dbf0-beqr0b890eq9r8b98.desc: ReactJS & Redux Music player. Contains usable mobile version, localStorage cache. Works with AudioSession Api, so browser features (like hotkey buttons Next/Prev, album preview) is working right.

fbd07wavab0987erab709adb.title: Todo
fbd07wavab0987erab709adb.desc: Anydo-like to-do list application with full functionality, including all CRUD operations (add, update, read, or delete any task), sorting by tags, and JWT Auth. It also includes a mobile version with Safari viewport and other enhancements.

fadb0978a8f90b7986da0968.title: Twitter Clone
fadb0978a8f90b7986da0968.desc: Utilizes final-form validation for form handling, allows posting tweets, has routings for both guests and logged-in users, and tweets fetching.

0879fbd9078adfb0a7dfb908.title: Nolk Landing Page
0879fbd9078adfb0a7dfb908.desc: Responsive template with SVG animations and a simple 3-step email form. Built on JS, utilizes Gulp as the main task runner.

a79e04bc-4bf4-4d23-b23d-c2c8221a6180.title: Matro UI
a79e04bc-4bf4-4d23-b23d-c2c8221a6180.desc: üëÅÔ∏è Highly optimized UI Components in one, tiny package for your React Applications.

d0c97369-e345-4759-a619-0520d4e58274.title: docusaurus-plugin-fix-react
d0c97369-e345-4759-a619-0520d4e58274.desc: Fixes the issue when npm package / exported Component uses React import, so webpack resolves it not from global node_modules/react but instead from package directory.

8fc7da5b-799a-4415-b0ef-f2633b0e55a6.title: Amazon Research Tool
8fc7da5b-799a-4415-b0ef-f2633b0e55a6.desc: Discover Amazon product info, find best prices, leverage SEO keywords, locate top suppliers with Reverse ASIN, and more. Available on the Google Chrome Store and Firefox Add-on's.
